function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulties in implementing and maintaining broad-scale mosquito control programs due to financial and environmental considerations","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases spreading within communities","Mitigation":"Explore alternative, sustainable mosquito control methods","Technologies":"Sustainable and eco-friendly mosquito control technologies","People":"Communities in endemic areas","Owner":"Public health organizations and local governments"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on personal protective measures in mosquito control efforts","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to mosquito-borne diseases at the individual level","Mitigation":"Promote and educate the public about personal protective measures","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns on personal protection","People":"Residents in endemic areas","Owner":"Public health organizations and local governments"},{"Description":"Limitations of population-level approach to vector control and lack of consideration for individual-level personal protection","Impact":"Inadequate protection for individuals from mosquito-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate individual-level personal protection measures in vector control strategies","Technologies":"Mathematical modeling of individual-level personal protection","People":"Residents in endemic areas","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"}]}
